CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 6, 1954, pg. 16 reads: "Presentation At Women's Home - The Married Women's Culture Club presented the table shown above to the Home for Aged and Infirm Colored Women on Lemington Avenue last Sunday with appropriate ceremonies. Among the group present were Mmes. Estella Garner, Frances Lee, Elizabeth L. Johnson, Bertha Brewer, president; Mary Brown, Essie O. Baltimore, Grace Booker, Lettie Harvey, Rena Weathers, Jennie Blow (not shown), Beulah Clark, Frankie Williams, Janie Thomas, Amanda Willis, Anna Brice, Julia Jackson, Louise Williams, Mamie Booth, Fannie Robinson, Vera Howard, Cora Arnold, Mahalia Greene, and Leo Yarborough, Georgia Goins and Alice Dyson.  The club was organized Oct. 6, 1906. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nine Married Women's Culture Club members, including woman on left, wearing eyeglasses, hat, and floral dress, standing around donated table with four chairs, in the Lemington Home for the Aged, another version
